item.title: Video Editor Needed for Engaging Video Advert - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create an engaging advert for our clients. The video should capture attention with dynamic visuals and informative text captions, effectively conveying the message and brand.

Responsibilities:
Edit raw video footage to create a polished and cohesive advert.
Add text captions to highlight key points and enhance engagement.
Incorporate visuals and graphics to make the video more appealing.
Collaborate with our team to refine and perfect the video.

Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio of previous work.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Ability to create engaging and visually appealing content.
Strong attention to detail and creativity.
Good communication skills and ability to meet deadlines.

To Apply:
Please submit your portfolio along with a brief description of your experience and why you’d be a great fit for this project. We look forward to working with a talented editor who can bring our client's vision to life.

Thank you!


Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:09 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing & Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing & Production, Motion Graphics

item.title: Video Editing Specialist for Online Training - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled video editing specialist to edit our onsite training videos for online training purposes. Your main responsibility will be to identify and extract the most valuable and informative segments from the videos and remove the background noise and visuals. The edited videos will be used for creating engaging online training courses. The ideal candidate should have a strong command of video editing software and excellent attention to detail. This project requires a meticulous and efficient approach to ensure the final videos meet our quality standards. If you have a passion for video editing and can deliver professional results, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Attention to detail
- Creativity
- Time management
- Strong communication skills

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00

item.title: Video Editor for Ongoing Real Estate Marketing Productions - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to join our team for ongoing real estate video productions. As a provider of high-quality marketing material for the real estate industry, we require someone with a keen eye for detail and a strong understanding of video editing techniques. The selected candidate will be responsible for editing, organizing, and enhancing raw footage to create compelling videos that showcase properties and captivate potential buyers. The role requires proficiency in video editing software (such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro) and a strong ability to work within tight deadlines. If you have a passion for video editing and a keen interest in real estate, we would love to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

- Edit raw footage and add relevant effects, transitions, and visual enhancements
- Organize and manage video files
- Collaborate with the creative team to develop video concepts
- Ensure video projects are completed within specified timelines

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a video editor
- Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
- Strong understanding of video editing techniques
- Attention to detail and ability to work independently
- Excellent time management and organizational skills
- Portfolio showcasing previous real estate video projects

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an expert-level video editor with a strong background in real estate marketing.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Hi,

We are a company selling bedding protection products on Amazon Europe, we need help to produce a marketing video for one of our products.

We're looking for someone who has done this kind of video before, and who can produce a targeted marketing piece for e-commerce platforms.

We would like to work with people who live in the EU to facilitate delivery of the product you will be working on.

Please share with us your experiences and examples of work you have done for this type of project.

Thank you in advance for your proposals.

Samir from Beddy-Bye

item.title: Social Media Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Livlong is seeking a creative and knowledgeable Social Media Specialist to manage our Instagram and Facebook pages. This is a part-time position, requiring 10 hours per week. The ideal candidate will have a background in nutrition, with certification being a significant plus.

Key Responsibilities:

Content Creation: Develop and design engaging and high-quality content for our Instagram and Facebook pages. This includes posts, stories, and reels.

Product Photography: Capture and edit compelling photographs of our supplement products to showcase their benefits and features.

Reel Production: Create informative and entertaining reels that highlight the nutritional value and unique selling points of our products.

Writing: Write informative and engaging captions and posts about the nutritional benefits of our products.

Community Engagement: Interact with our followers, respond to comments and messages, and foster a positive and informative community.

Strategy Development: Collaborate with the team to develop and implement effective social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement.

Qualifications:

Experience: Proven experience in managing social media accounts, particularly Instagram and Facebook.

Skills: Strong content creation skills, including photography, videography, and writing.

Knowledge: Solid understanding of nutrition and supplements. Certification in nutrition is a significant advantage.

Creativity: Ability to think creatively and develop unique content ideas that align with our brand.

Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Tools: Proficiency with social media management tools, photo and video editing software.

Preferred Qualifications:

Education: Degree in nutrition, dietetics, or a related field.
Certification: Certified Nutrition Specialist (CNS), Registered Dietitian (RD), or equivalent.

If you are passionate about nutrition and social media and are excited about helping us grow our online presence, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio of your previous social media work.

Hourly Range: $14.00-$49.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 14:04 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Facebook, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story, Social Media Content
Skills: Facebook, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story, Social Media Content
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

item.title: Social Media Face for Explainer TikToks and Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a charismatic and articulate individual with perfect English to be the face of our social media presence. This role involves creating, scripting, and editing explainer videos for TikTok and Instagram Reels to promote our product.

Responsibilities:

Serve as the on-screen personality for explainer videos on TikTok and Instagram Reels.
Develop engaging scripts that effectively communicate our product’s features and benefits.
Record, edit, and produce high-quality videos that align with our brand’s voice and style.
Collaborate with our marketing team to brainstorm and execute creative content ideas.
Stay updated with social media trends to ensure content is relevant and engaging.
Requirements:

Excellent command of English with strong verbal communication skills.
Experience in creating and editing videos for TikTok and Instagram Reels.
Comfortable being on camera and engaging with an audience.
Ability to write clear, compelling scripts for explainer videos.
Proficiency with video editing software and tools.
Strong understanding of social media trends and best practices.
To Apply:

Please provide links to your portfolio or examples of your previous work on TikTok and Instagram Reels.
Include a brief description of your experience in video creation and editing.
Share any relevant success stories or metrics from your past work.
We look forward to finding a talented individual to bring our social media presence to life and help us connect with our audience through engaging explainer videos!





Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:53 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Instagram, Instagram Story, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Instagram, Instagram Story, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor for Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an awesome video editor to join my team and edit videos with me for my Youtube channel. The perfect candidate will have a strong grasp of video editing techniques and can bring their own creativity and innovation to their work. Responsibilities include trimming and organizing footage, adding cool transitions and effects, subtitles, using b-roll with footage I already have, and working along with me to make the perfect video. The videos will cover topics about physical health, mental health, longevity, Okinawa, Japan, blue zone health, etc. The English used for these videos is quite advanced, so I will need someone is close to fluent.

It has some animated text subtitles that slide in that i'm looking to change, so I'm looking for someone who can cover it up to change the words, and then provide me with the project file in aftereffects.

item.title: Quinceañera Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a talented video creator to create a special video for my daughter's quinceañera (15th birthday). The video will be played on a projector during her birthday party, so it needs to be visually captivating and emotionally touching. The video should include a compilation of photos and videos from her childhood, as well as interviews with family and friends sharing their wishes and memories. It should be a beautiful tribute that captures the essence of her journey into womanhood. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, storytelling, and music selection. Creativity, attention to detail, and strong communication skills are a must.

Relevant skills:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Music selection
- Creativity
- Attention to detail

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $120
Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:44 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Photo Slideshow, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Education

item.title: Short-form video editor who speaks FRENCH - Upwork
item.description:
Bonjour

On cherche un monteur vidéo qui puisse monter mes shorts pour Instagram.

Je voudrais 30 shorts par mois et chaque short est 2-5$ (dépendant de la durée et le style). (ca ne vous prendra pas plus de 20 min a faire)

Montage simple, pas s'animations ouf, puisque mon audience est âgée.

Un style clean, pas trop de cut, juste enlever les blancs. Les B-Roll doivent être mis pour embellir la vidéo et la rendre plus dynamique. Ils peuvent aussi servir à illustrer un de mes propos.

Video exemples:

https://www.instagram.com/p/C5lnhlxNRA2/

https://www.instagram.com/p/C4ixPO9t5n9/

Hourly Range: $8.00-$16.00

item.title: Video Editor & Graphic Designer for Facebook Ads for Senior Bodycare Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a creative and proactive Video Editor and Graphic Designer to provide us with effective images and videos for our Facebook and other paid social media channels. Our body care products are marketed towards mature adults, so experience with similar brands would be great.

- Must be able to attend at least 1 weekly meeting and actively communicate with our team on Trello.
- Have experience in creating effective images and videos for these platforms.
- We use Canva and Veed.io to create our content so you must be able to work with these two or have experience with similar services. Adobe suite and other similar platforms is OK too.
- You will work on an as needed basis.

Please send a portfolio or links to past images and videos you created for Facebook ads.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:32 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising
Skills: Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Facebook Advertising
Country: United States

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor who specializes in content creation. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos that align with our brand and engage our target audience. The ideal candidate should have access to a library of video assets and be able to quickly respond to project requests. Creativity is highly valued, but we also need someone who can deliver projects on time and meet deadlines.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and produce videos for various platforms
  - Incorporate visual effects and sound enhancements
  - Ensure videos are engaging and aligned with brand guidelines
  - Collaborate with the creative team to develop video concepts

  Skills:
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of video editing techniques and principles
  - Ability to work independently and efficiently
  - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

  Size: Medium
  Duration: 1 to 3 months
  Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:31 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Thumbnail Designer for Engaging Content - Upwork
item.description:
What I Need:

Eye-Catching Designs: Thumbnails that grab attention in a crowded feed and accurately represent the video content.

Fast Turnaround: Ideally, thumbnails completed within 1 week of receiving the video details.

Clear Communication: Someone who actively communicates and understands my vision for the thumbnails.

Software Proficiency: Experience with design software like Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator is a plus.

Project Details:

Number of thumbnails: 4 initially, with the potential for ongoing work.
Style: Funny & Engaging: Use humor and eye-catching elements. Channel Icon Integration: Subtly incorporate our channel icon to increase our  brand recognition. Consistent color palette and text style across our thumbnails to create our branded look. Use clear, crisp photos or animation that showcase the destination or activity in our videos. Use a clear layout with a central focus point to draw the viewer's eye.

What to Include in Your Proposal:

Portfolio: Link to your portfolio showcasing relevant design work, especially for thumbnails or YouTube content.

Experience: Briefly describe your experience with thumbnail design and YouTube content.

Rates: Your hourly rate or fixed price per thumbnail.

Availability: When you can start working on this project.
I look forward to seeing your creative proposals!




Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:26 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Thumbnail, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Thumbnail, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Photo Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Education Animation Video Creator for Kids - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented animator to create educational animation videos for kids on YouTube. The videos will need to be engaging, fun, and educational, targeting children aged 3-8 years old. The animator will be responsible for creating the animations, adding voiceovers and music, and ensuring that the videos are visually appealing and easy for kids to understand.

   Skills required:
   - Animation
   - Video editing
   - Illustration
   - Voiceover
   - Music production

   This is a small project that requires creativity and a passion for educating young children. The selected animator will have the opportunity to work on multiple videos with the potential for long-term collaboration.

   Size: Small
   Duration: Under 1 month
   Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 17, 2024 13:19 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Animation, Video Editing, Education, Video Production, 2D Animation
Skills: Animation, Video Editing, Education, Video Production, 2D Animation
